name: jue-jin
title: Juejin
description: Display recommended articles under each category of Nuggets, and support the selection and switching of different types of articles
author: sharker_alice_sharker

commands.name: news
commands.title: News Articles
commands.description: Display Nuggets recommended articles and request different types of recommended articles by type

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
